title: Jungle no Ouja Taa-chan
synopsis: Ta-chan is the king of jungle. He was abandoned in savanna, and has been raised by a chimpanzee, Etekichi. He has a dearest wife, Jane who used to be a top model in New York, but now she looks... Anyway, to protect animals from poachers, Ta-chan is fighting against them with his disciple, Pedro, and a master of Chinese martial arts, Ryo.
voices: ['Kishitani, Goro', 'Narahashi, Miki', 'Yamaguchi, Kappei', 'Takayama, Minami', 'Mitsuishi, Kotono', 'Hiyama, Nobuyuki', 'Ishii, Kouji', 'Yanada, Kiyoyuki']
